Title: The world never gets boring, you could write about anything. It i...
Description: The world never gets boring, you could write about anything. It is a pity nonetheless that much news is about natural disasters and, in particular, wildfires, as we Greeks have gotten used to hearing about their devastating impacts. Today's article is focusing on the ongoing wildfires in Athens, the country's fire tradition, and the recommended safety standards (and how Greece is doing the exact opposite).PoliticsGROn the massive wildfires in AthensCoverage of the events, Greece's tradition with fires, and the regarded safety standards
